root.name: New Zealand Story Revolution
root.description: OverviewNew Zealand Story Revolution is a remake of the Taito classic New Zealand Story. It features updated graphics, redesigned levels, touchscreen controls, and new power-ups.StoryAn evil leopard seal has kidnapped Tiki, his girlfriend Phee-Phee, and the rest of the kiwis. Tiki manages to escape and he must travel throughout New Zealand to rescue the kiwis. Along the way, he encounters various obstacles and fights several bosses, eventually defeating the leopard seal and saving his friends.
